Package backEnd

Class Item

java.lang.Object
backEnd.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
Weapon
public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
Items that are available to buy or sell by the player from/to a store when visiting the island
Items includes food and weapons
Author:
Aerinn Nguyen, Bede Skinner-Vennell

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item()
      Constructor for an item Constructs an empty item

    • Item

      public Item​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String type, int size, int price)
      Constructor for an item
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item
      description - The description of the item
      type - The type of the item, Food, Weapon, Jewellery or Special
      size - The inventory space the item takes up
      price - The price of the item

    • sellItem

      public void sellItem​(Island island, int price)
      Player wants to increase coins or get rid of an item by selling it to a store that will buy it
      Parameters:
      island - The island where the store is based
      price - The price which the item was sold for by the player

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Item item)
      Identify if the 2 items are equal or not
      Parameters:
      item - The other item that needs to be compared with
      Returns:
      true (if they are equal) or false (if they are different)
